remarks: If the kernel and range of a homomorphism of left modules are Noetherian, then so is the domain.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lmhmfgsplit.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` T ) $.
lmhmfgsplit.k $e |- K = ( `' F " { .0. } ) $.
lmhmfgsplit.u $e |- U = ( S |`s K ) $.
lmhmfgsplit.v $e |- V = ( T |`s ran F ) $.
lmhmlnmsplit $p |- ( ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) /\ U e. LNoeM /\ V e. LNoeM ) -> S e. LNoeM ) $.
